short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calls a phone number highlighted on a web page using Brite PBX

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts callto:xxxxxxxx links to use Brite Click 2 dial.  Allows user to hilight a phone number, and right click to call the number. The call transfers to the users desk phone, and dials the number when the desk phone is picked up.
